properties.entry: SELECT HOS_NO ,HOS_NAME ,HOS_ADDRESS FROM TB_HOSPITAL WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND HOS_NAME LIKE ? OR HOS_NAME = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT HOS_NO ,HOS_NAME ,HOS_ADDRESS ,TREAT_NAME ,TREAT_DATE ,TREAT_BEGIN ,TREAT_END ,HOS_TEL ,HOS_INFO FROM TB_HOSPITAL JOIN TB_TREAT_DEPARTMENT ON (TREAT_DEP = TREAT_NO) WHERE HOS_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT DOCTOR_NO ,DOCTOR_NAME ,TREAT_NAME FROM TB_DOCTOR JOIN TB_TREAT_DEPARTMENT ON (TREAT_DEP = TREAT_NO) WHERE HOS_NO = ?
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,NICKNAME ,CONTENT ,SCOPE ,R.CREATE_DATE FROM TB_HOS_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (REVIEW_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE REVIEW_HOS = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, H.* FROM ( SELECT HOS_NO ,HOS_NAME ,HOS_ADDRESS ,TREAT_DEP ,TREAT_DATE ,TREAT_BEGIN ,TREAT_END ,HOS_TEL ,HOS_INFO FROM TB_HOSPITAL WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE) H) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
